name: Canvas Component Deselect

movements.name: Deselect

beats.title: Hide Overlays for ID
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want deselectComponent to execute reliably with latency < 1 second so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).
beats.testCase: publishes canvas.component.created with id + correlationId when both present (createdNode path)

then: it performs its expected orchestration logic
and: emits expected side effects or returns expected value

beats.title: Publish Deselection Changed
beats.scenario: Publish or Deploy publish Deselection Changed
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want publishDeselectionChanged to execute reliably with latency < 1 minute so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).
beats.testCase: publishes canvas.component.deselection.changed when publishDeselectionChanged is called

then: it performs its expected orchestration logic
and: emits expected side effects or returns expected value

movements.userStory: As an interaction designer, I need deselect to clear overlays and notify subscribers within ≤100ms P95.
movements.businessValue: Enables reliable operations with measurable KPIs; ensures consistent service delivery with SLA compliance (target: 99.9%)
